alert.note: Alert for Brewster (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 8:09PM CDT until October 12 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Brewster County in southwestern Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 808 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles south of Marathon, or 32 miles southeast of Alpine, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will approach US HWY 385. HAIL...1.75IN WIND...60MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
